name: Zombie Maze (itch) (Solarr21)
description:
You wake up in front of a dark maze...

Blast through the enemy-filled halls as fast as you can while gathering points.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys for movement and click the screen to fire as you work your way through the two levels and boss fight.

The game might receive some updates or even a fully new version sometime in the future, I'm not sure.
